name: FusionX Tournaments
description:
Professor G. Scott Gigawatt was a hippie in the 1960s and he yearns back to those happier times gone by.

Help him with his 1960s time portal project by becoming his physics assistant. Match three atoms with a power-up to activate the time portal.

FusionX Tournaments is an engaging, easy to learn match three game.

Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, physical or virtual prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

Enjoy engaging gameplay all day long!

Dive into tournaments and head-to-head competitions.

Let's start the science project with Professor G. Scott Gigawatt and play match three competition like no other!

How FusionX Tournaments Works:

• Swap to match 3 atoms of the same color to gain watts.

• The Player with the most watts will win.

Controls:

• You can move atoms horizontally, vertically and diagonally.

Scoring & Strategy Tips:

• Use power-ups to match more atoms at once.

• Use power-ups to reach other power-up atoms in difficult places.

Player vs Player Competition

• Face off against players of similar skills.

• Play Head to Head with other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments.

• In head to head games, both players get the same track in the same order.

• The player who finishes with the most watts wins!

Compete Worldwide:

• Challenge people around the world.

• See where you rank on the leaderboards.

• Earn trophies that prove your mettle.
